name: Battery
description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.

Adds 2 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

name: Heavy Duty Battery
description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength."

Adds 4 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

name: Focus Lens
description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.

Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Decreases the width of the Flashlight beam by 15%.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

name: Wide Lens
description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition. Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.

Decreases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.

name: Power Bulb
description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

name: TIR Optic
description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

name: Low Amp Filament
description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.

Decreases Flashlight battery consumption by 20%.

name: Leather Grip
description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.

Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 20%.

name: Broken Bulb
description:
A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

Causes the Flashlight to flicker.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 15%.Increases Blindness duration by 30%.Increases the spookiness just a little.

name: High-end Sapphire lens
description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.

Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

name: Intense Halogen
description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 40%.Increases Blindness duration by 20%.

name: Long Life Battery
description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.

Adds 6 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

name: Odd Bulb
description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 50%.Increases Blindness duration by 25%.Increases Flashlight battery consumption by 14%.

name: Rubber Grip
description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.

Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 40%.

name: Prayer Rope
description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.

Adds 10 seconds of use to the Key.

name: Prayer Beads
description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.

Adds 15 seconds of use to the Key.

name: Eroded Token
description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass. If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's aura reading ability.

Reveals Survivor auras when within 24 meters.

name: Gold Token
description:
A gold token with a dull appearance. Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.

Reveals Survivor auras when within a 48 meter range.

name: Blood Amber
description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins. The amber is warm to the touch. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.

Reveals the Killer's aura within a 32 meter range.Increases the Key's energy usage by 100%.

name: Milky Glass
description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise. When the Key is used to unlock the Hatch, the glass token protects the Key from breaking, channeling The Fog's energy into the glass.

Do not lose the Key when unlocking the Hatch, lose this add-on instead.

name: Weaved Ring
description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen. The ring binds the Key to the user, preventing its loss even in the darkest of times.

Do not lose the Key on death, lose this add-on instead.

name: Scratched Pearl
description:
A porous and scratched white pearl. A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the Key.

Increases the range of the Key's aura reading ability by 12 meters.

name: Unique Wedding Ring
description: An engraved wedding ring that emerged from The Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy. Reveals the Obsession's aura at all times, without the need to channel the Key's energy.Decreases your chances to be The Killerâ€™s Obsession.

name: Map Addendum
description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material. A partial and faded Map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.

Adds a 5 second charge to any Map.

name: Retardant Jelly
description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade. This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.

Slows down the burning rate of the Map by 20%.

name: Glass Bead
description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the Map and mark a specific position. The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.

Unlocks the marker ability on the Secondary Action button.Creates a marker that can be seen by all Survivors.

name: Crystal Bead
description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus. The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.

Every Survivor sees the aura generated by the Map when the owner activates it.

name: Odd Stamp
description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood. The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od". Can be used with a Map.

Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 12 meters.

name: Unusual Stamp
description:
A wooden stamp with a crosshatched rubber pad used to mark documents. It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used. Can be used with a Map.

Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 8 meters.

name: Black Silk Cord
description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

name: Red Twine
description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red color. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track the Killer's belongings.

name: Yellow Wire
description:
A small electrical wire. Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track exit gates.

name: Bandages
description:
A pack of bandages usually found in first aid kits.

Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.

name: Gel Dressings
description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exudating wounds.

Adds 16 charges to the Med-kit.

name: Medical Scissors
description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.

Increases healing speed by 15%.

name: Butterfly Tape
description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.

Increases healing speed by 5%.

name: Sponge
description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.

Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 5%.

name: Rubber Gloves
description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.

Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 3%.

name: Styptic Agent
description:
A white powder with coagulant properties. Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from hemorrhaging.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Styptic Agent.When the Styptic Agent is used on an injured Survivor, they gain Endurance for 8 seconds.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

name: Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe
description:
An anti-hemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe.The affected Survivor will gain a health state 16 seconds after use.The time required is modified by perks, items and add-ons that affect Healing Speeds.This effect is canceled when the affected Survivor changes health state or is picked up.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

name: Abdominal Dressing
description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.

Increases healing speed by 25%.Decreases Med-kit charges by 8.

name: Refined Serum
description:
A refined version of the putrid serum thatâ€™s mostly safe for human consumption. Mostly.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Refined Serum.Increases the speed of the Survivor by 5% for 20 seconds.Creates a blight trail behind the Survivor.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

name: Gauze Roll
description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds. Part of a total wound care system.

Adds 12 charges to the Med-kit.

name: Needle & Thread
description:
Not exactly a medical device, however it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.

Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 10%.100% Bonus Bloodpoints granted for succeeding Great Skill Checks.Increases healing speed by 15%.

name: Self Adherent Wrap
description:
A pack of bandages that sticks to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.

Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.Increases healing speed by 5%.

name: Surgical Suture
description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue. Even though it's very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.

Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 15%.150% Bonus Bloodpoints granted for succeeding Great Skill Checks.Increases healing speed by 15%.

name: Scraps
description:
Springs, screws and gears. Mostly unusable junk.

Adds 8 charges to the Toolbox.

name: Wire Spool
description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.

Adds 12 charges to the Toolbox.

name: Clean Rag
description:
A mundane rag. Suspiciously clean.

Increases the Toolbox's repair speed by 20%.

name: Grip Wrench
description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip. Essential in any Toolbox.

Hooks sabotaged using the Toolbox take an extra 15 seconds to respawn.

name: Hacksaw
description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.

Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 20%.

name: Protective Gloves
description:
Thick gloves which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.

Prevents the Killer from being notified when sabotaging a hook with the Toolbox.

name: Brand New Part
description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place. It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.

Toolbox Repair action is replaced with Install Brand New Part.Installing the Brand New Part will automatically repair 15% of a generator over 5 seconds.During the installation, you will be faced with 2 difficult Skill Checks.Successfully hitting a Skill Check will result in an additional 5% generator repair progress, up to a total of 25% generator repair progress.This add-on is consumed after use.

name: Instructions
description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.

Eliminates Skill Checks while repairing with the Toolbox.

name: Cutting Wire
description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.

Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 15%.

name: Socket Swivels
description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.

Increases the Toolbox repair speed by 30%.

name: Spring Clamp
description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.

The distance at which your repairs can be heard is reduced by 8 meters.
